nodes.text: Varas Hoorst was a Human male who lived on the planet Cularin during the Clone Wars. He operated a speeder repair shop in the platform city Bayonard, employing the Wookiee Rroggerr and the Zabrak Vinda as mechanics. He was an associate of a group of Thaereian military agents who traveled to Cularin to assassinate the diplomat Gavid Lermyn.
